entry.data:
CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
